alert.note: Alert for Eastern Glacier, Toole, Central, Eastern Pondera, Liberty (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued August 14 at 2:37AM MDT until August 16 at 12:00AM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING FOR HOT TEMPERATURES, GUSTY WINDS, AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 112... * AFFECTED AREA...Eastern Glacier/Toole/Central/Eastern Pondera/Liberty. * TEMPERATURES...In the mid 90s. * WINDS...West 10 to 20 mph, with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 12 percent. * IMPACTS...Any new fire starts could be difficult to contain.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are possible. A combination of gusty winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures will create high fire growth potential. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in these areas of this Fire Weather Watch.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Glacier, Toole, Central, Eastern Pondera, Liberty
